Use a chalkboard as a music board. Draw a piano keyboard on the chalkboard and use it as a tool to practice playing the piano.
Use a chalkboard as a puzzle board. Draw a maze or a picture on the chalkboard and use it as a puzzle to solve.
Use a chalkboard as a personalized message board. Write a message or a quote on the chalkboard and leave it as a reminder for yourself.
Use a chalkboard as a cooking surface. Cover the chalkboard with a sheet of plastic wrap and use it as a surface to chop vegetables or knead dough.
Use a chalkboard as a decoration. Paint a colorful design on the chalkboard and use it as a decorative piece in your home or office.
